TEXT.TITLE: LIFE TECHNOLOGIES <LTEK> IN LICENSING AGREEMENT
TEXT.BODY: Life Technologies Inc said it signed a two mln dlr technology transfer and licensing agreement with Toray Industries Inc, a Tokyo-based maker of synthetic fibers and industrial, consumer and medical products. Under terms of the agreement, Life said Toray purchased exclusive rights to market Life's hepatitus B detection technology in Japan, Korea and Taiwan. Moreover, Life said the companies agreed to begin a joint research and development program to develop other human diagnostic products. Reuter
